welcome: Welcome to Save It For Others (SIFO)
intro_text: Your platform for making a difference through donations.
feedback_intro: We value your feedback! Please let us know your thoughts.
subject: Subject
intro_aim: Bridge the gap between abundance and need, enabling the efficient transfer of food and essential items to those who require them. By minimizing waste and maximizing impact, we strive to create a more sustainable and compassionate society.
intro_donors: When you donate non-food items or food through our platform, you're playing a vital role in supporting those in need. Your contributions provide crucial items to individuals and families facing challenges. We make sure that your donations go to the appropriate organizations, making it simple for you to give back and make a positive difference in the lives of others.
intro_charities: Charities that focus on clothing and food support can use our platform to expand their reach. By collaborating with us, they can effectively gather donations and distribute them to those who need them the most. Our aim is to assist these organizations in their efforts to combat hunger and provide essential clothing, contributing to a healthier and more just community.
dua: The likeness of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah, is as the likeness of a grain (of corn); it grows seven ears, and each ear has a hundred grains. Allah gives manifold increase to whom He wills. Surah Al-Baqarah, verse 261
